title: Style your map
desc: Learn about styling the vector tiles with the GL style specification and how to reuse existing styles for OpenMapTiles.

title: Maps in a website
desc: Display vector tiles in a web client using either MapboxGL, Leaflet, Tangram or OpenLayers3.

title: Hosting map tiles
desc: Tutorials how to set up different tileservers and hosting the vector tiles yourself.

title: Maps in a mobile app
desc: Use the vector tiles in Android and iOS and even offline.

title: Generate vector tiles
desc: Use the open process and tools to create the vector tiles yourself.

title: Generate raster tiles
desc: Create raster tiles from your images.
